boids

Class Boid

  • java.lang.Object
    • boids.Boid

  • public class Boid
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a boid that evolves within a 2D boid simulator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor of a boid, with max speed {x, y, fillColor, maxSpeed}.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boid

        public Boid(int x,
            int y,
            java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Constructor of a boid {x, y, fillColor}.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate where to place the boid.
        y - The y-coordinate where to place the boid.
        fillColor - The color to fill in the boid with.

      • Boid

        public Boid(int x,
            int y,
            java.awt.Color fillColor,
            double maxSpeed)
        Constructor of a boid, with max speed {x, y, fillColor, maxSpeed}.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate where to place the boid.
        y - The y-coordinate where to place the boid.
        fillColor - The color to fill in the boid with.
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed for a boid.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public final void update()
        Update the velocity and the location of a boid. The update is a simple application of boid rules as they are described in the wording.

      • limitVelocity

        public void limitVelocity()
        Limit the speed/velocity of the boid. Boids tend to go faster as long as the simulation continues. In real life, animals do not speed up endlessly. This is not a real rule, it is applied after force computation. It normalizes the velocity of the boid with the definied limit.

      • restart

        public final void restart()
        Restart the boid. The initial location is restored and the boid is redrawn.

      • draw

        public final void draw(java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Draw the boid.
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The color to fill in the boid with.

      • getLocation

        public Vector2D getLocation()
        Location getter.
        Returns:
        The location of the boid as a 2D vector.

      • getVelocity

        public Vector2D getVelocity()
        Velocity getter.
        Returns:
        The velocity of the boid as a 2D vector.

      • getAcceleration

        public Vector2D getAcceleration()
        Acceleration getter.
        Returns:
        The acceleration of the boid as a 2D vector.

      • setAcceleration

        public void setAcceleration(Vector2D newAcc)
        Acceleration setter. Once the acceleration is set, everything follows.
        Parameters:
        newAcc - The new acceleration of the boid.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Boid boid)
        Get distance between this boid and another one.
        Parameters:
        boid - The other boid.
        Returns:
        The Euclidean distance between two boids.

      • getIcon

        public GraphicalBoid getIcon()
        Icon getter.
        Returns:
        The icon (drawing) of the boid.
